svg.text: Hierarchical Agent Architecture ‚Ä¢ Google ADK + AG-UI/A2UI + MCP + A2A Protocol
Auth0 + OpenBao + Multi-Tenant ‚Ä¢ Parallel Execution ‚Ä¢ Enterprise-Grade

g.text: Intent Classification ‚Ä¢ Multi-Agent Routing ‚Ä¢ Context Management ‚Ä¢ A2UI Rendering ‚Ä¢ LLM: Gemini 2.0 Flash / Claude
LAYER 2: DOMAIN AGENTS (Business Logic - Cloud Agnostic)
LAYER 3: CLOUD PROVIDER AGENTS (Cloud-Specific Logic + MCP Ownership)
Each Cloud Agent owns its MCP server exclusively ‚Ä¢ Handles cloud-specific API patterns ‚Ä¢ Manages credentials via OpenBao ‚Ä¢ Parallel execution
LAYER 4: MCP SERVERS (1:1 Mapping with Cloud Agents)
Cost Explorer ‚Ä¢ Compute Optimizer ‚Ä¢ Trusted Advisor ‚Ä¢ CloudWatch
Cost Management ‚Ä¢ Advisor ‚Ä¢ Resource Graph ‚Ä¢ Monitor
Cloud Billing ‚Ä¢ Recommender ‚Ä¢ Asset Inventory ‚Ä¢ Monitoring

svg.text: Multi-Cloud FinOps Agent Architecture ‚Ä¢ Hierarchical 4-Layer Design ‚Ä¢ Auth0 + A2A + OpenBao + Multi-Tenant ‚Ä¢ January 2026
